column2: "Muhun EWURADZE dɛ ogyina afɔrmbukyia no nkyɛn: na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Bɔ etsifi apɔw no ma mpondua no nwosow: na bubu gu hɔn nyina etsifi; na medze afona bokuku hɔn a wɔbɛka ekyir no; hɔn mu kor mpo runnguan
column4: na hɔn mu kor mpo rimmfi nsa."

column3: me nsa bɛfa hɔn efi hɔ aba; na sɛ wɔfow kɔ sor a

column2: "Na sɛ wokosuma hɔnho wɔ Bepɔw Karmel etsifi a
column3: mobɔkɔ hɔn atwee akɛfa hɔn efi hɔ; na sɛ wofi m’enyim kosuma po ase a
column4: mebɛhyɛ ɔwɔ ma oefi hɔ akeka hɔn."

column2: "Na sɛ wɔkɔ hɔn atamfo enyim ndɔmmum a
column3: mebɛhyɛ ma afona efi hɔ ekuku hɔn: na medze m’enyi betsim hɔn do wɔ mbusu ntsi

column4: nye nyia ɔka asaase ma ɔnan
column5: ma hɔn a wɔtse do nyina dzi nkɔmbɔ; na ne nyina beyir dɛ Esutsen Nael; na ɔatwe bio dɛ Egypt Esutsen no;"

column2: "ɔno na osi ne mpia wɔ sor
column3: na ɔato ne samandan ase wɔ asaase; ɔno a ɔfrɛ po mu nsu na ohue gu asaase enyi; EWURADZE nye ne dzin."
ana hom nnyɛ me dɛ Etiopiafo mba? Ana nnyɛ emi na medze Israel fii Egypt asaase no do
EWURADZE Nyankopɔn enyi sa ahendzi bɔn no
column4: na mebɛsɛɛ no efi asaase enyi; gyedɛ Jakob fiefo nko na merennsɛɛ hɔn korakora
mebɛhyɛ ma wɔaapo Israel do wɔ amanaman nyina mu
column5: dɛ mbrɛ wɔpo ewu do wɔ mpododze mu

column2: "Me man mu ndzebɔnyɛfo nyina bowu afona anomu
"Da no mu na mebɛma David ntamadan a egura no do egyina
column3: na mesisiw no ntokur no; na mama n’afasin no do
column4: na matow no dɛ tsetse nda no:"

column2: "ama wɔaafa Edom nkaa no ayɛ hɔndze
column3: na amanaman a wɔdze me dzin frɛ hɔn no nyina
column4: EWURADZE a ɔyɛ iyi nyina no na ɔse."

column5: dɛ nyia ofuntum bɔto nyia otwa
column6: na nyia otsiatsia wenyinaba do bɔto nyia ɔpe aba; na mbepɔw bɔsosɔw nsa fenemfenem

column2: "Na medze me man Israel no befi ndɔmmum asan aba
column4: na wɔatsenatsena mu; na wɔbɛtsetsɛw wenyin nture
column5: na wɔanom ne nsa no bi; wɔbɛyɛ nture so

column2: "Na mebɛtsetsɛw hɔn wɔ hɔn asaase do
column3: na wonnkotutu hɔn efi hɔn asaase a medze ama hɔn no do
